comments.body: `T extends NumberArray | number`?  I don't know anything about the functionality - it just looks like it should have the same signature as `interpolateNumberArray`.

The `number[]` case is already covered by [the overload before this one](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/48177/files/c2c4aa02a7298308b948cf29ab3936d949ced48d#diff-68305de20524395d8003b09966a09eb7R152).
